summary: Consume Taiga API to perform operations on epics, issues, tasks, and user stories.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on (epic, issue, task, user story).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (create, delete, get, get many, update).

parameters.name: project name or id
parameters.description: ID of the project to which the epic belongs.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Subject of the epic to create.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating an epic.

parameters.name: epic id
parameters.description: ID of the epic to delete.
